plot: A young woman (O'Brien) visits her father in Japan, meets a Japanese War Orphan (Hibari Misora) and raises money to build an orphanage.
title: Futari no hitomi
plot_es: A young woman (O'Brien) visits her father in Japan, meets a Japanese War Orphan (Hibari Misora) and raises money to build an orphanage.
plot_en: A young woman (O'Brien) visits her father in Japan, meets a Japanese War Orphan (Hibari Misora) and raises money to build an orphanage.
